nbl: kungavikelwa bunjani ukuba sidisi kwelutjha vukuzenzele unnamed kuneendlela ezi hlukileko zoku vikela ukuba sidisi kwamatlawana, ezifaka hlangana ukukhetha ukungayi emse meni ukufikela lapho wenda khona namkha nasele ukulungele ukuba nabentwana.
zul: kungavikelwa kanjani ukukhule lwa kwabesifazane abasebancane vukuzenzele unnamed ziningi izindle la zokuvikela ukuthi abesifazane abasebancane bangakhulelwa, lokhu kubandakanya uku khetha ukungazibanda kanyi ocansini kuze kube uyashada noma usukulungele ukuba nezingane.

nbl: abanye abantu badlumbana bona ukuzithiba (ukukhetha ukungayi emsemeni ukufikela lapho benda khona) kusikade, kantike abanye bayakwenyula njengendlela engcono etjengisa ukuziphatha kuhle.
zul: abanye abantu bacabanga ukuthi ukuzilwa kocansi (ngokukhetha ukungazibandakanyi ocansini kuze kube uyashada) isidala leso, ngenkathi abanye becabanga ukuthi kuyiyonanto elungile ukuthi yenziwe.

nbl: nanyana kunjalo, kufuze amatlawana azithathele isiquntweso ngokwawo.
zul: abesifazane abasebancane, noma kunjalo, kumele bazithathele bona izinqumo ngokwabo.

nbl: abantu abanengi abafuni ukulinda ukungena emtjhadweni ngaphambi kokuya emsemeni.
zul: abantu abaningi abafuni ukulinda kuze kube bayashada ukuze benze ucansi.

nbl: abafuni godu ukurhabela izinto ngalokhoke bagcine sebenze iimphoso ezikulu.
zul: abafuni futhi ngokunjalo ukujaha izinto kanye nokwenza amaphutha anzima.

nbl: kanengi vane baqunte ngokuriyadisa ukuya emsemeni bebabe bakhulu, bakghone ukuziphendulela, babe nobudlelwano bezethando obunzinzileko nomlingani munye begodu nasele basebenza, kuyinto engcono khulu.
zul: bavama ukunquma ukuzibambezela ekwenzeni ucansi kuze kushaye isikhathi sokuthi babe badala ngokwanele, bakwazi ukulandela izibophezelo, babe sebudlelwaneni obumileyo nomuntu oyedwa kanye nokuthi basebenze, kuyiyonanto elungile ukuyenza.

nbl: nawukhetha ukuzithiba namkha ukuriyadisa ukuya emsemeni, kunezinye izinto ongazenza ukuzivikela: khetha ngokuyelela aba ntu ofuna babe bangani bakho.
zul: uma ukhetha ukungazibandakanyi noma ukuzibambezela kwezocansi, zikhona ezinye izinto ongazenza ukuzivikela: khetha abangani bakho ngokucophelela.

nbl: kufuze abangani bakufisele okuhle ngaso soke isikhathi begodu kufuze bahloniphe isiqunto sakho sokungayi emsemeni.
zul: aba ngani abazokufunela oku hle futhi abazosihlonipha isinqumo sakho soku ngazibandakanyi ocansini.

nbl: yelela ubujamo obungaba ngobungakaphephi, nje ngabangani abaselako namkha abasebenzisa iindakamizwa, oku ngadosela ekutheni uye emsemeni ngendlela engakaphephi.
zul: qaphela izimo oku ngenzeka ukuthi zinga bi nokuphepha, njenga bangani abaphuza noma abadla izidakamizwa, ezingakuholela ocansini olungaphephile.

nbl: khambela kude nomli ngani okukatelela bona ukuya naye emsemeni ku sitjengiso sethando lakho.
zul: qaphela abantu othandana nabo abathi uzolala nabo uma ubathanda.

nbl: lalela bewufunde kilabo ababasidisi basese matlawana.
zul: lalela futhi ufunde kulabo besifazane abasebancane abake bakhulelwa.

nbl: bayazazi iimphoso zabo neenkhisi abarhohlomela kizo.
zul: bayazi ngalawo maphutha kanye nobubi bakhona.

nbl: lalela ababelethi bakho begodu ufunde emlandweni wamaphilo wabo nabasakhulako.
zul: lalela futhi ufunde kubazali bakho ngezimo aba bhekane nazo empilweni.

nbl: nawuqunta bonyana ukuzithiba nokuriyadisa ukuya emsemeni akusizo iinqunto ezikufaneleko nezingcono begodu awufuni ukulinda, zinikele isikhathi ufunde ngokuzivikela, okufaka hlangana iinkhandelambeleko, okukusebenzisa indlelathize (isikhandelambeleko esifakwa hlangana neqanda nembewu, ipilisi nofana ikhondomu) ukuvikela ukuba sidisi.
zul: uma unquma ukuthi ukungazibandakanyi kanye nokuzibambezela kwezocansi izinqumo ezi ngakulungele futhi angeke ukwazi ukulinda, zinike isikhathi ufunde ngoku zivikela, okubandakanya ukuvikela ukukhulelwa, lokhu okusebenzisa indlela (yomshini noma yezithako zamakhemikhali) zokuvikela ukukhulelwa.

nbl: kuneenkhandelambeleko ezisebenza ngeendlela ezihlukileko, kodwana zoke zenzelwe ukuvikela imbeleko.
zul: kunenqwaba yezindlela zokuvikela ukukhulelwa ezisebenza ngezindlela ezehlukene, kodwa zonke zakhiwelwe ukuvikela ukukhulelwa.

nbl: zifaka hlangana isivikelambeleko esiselwako, esaziwa ngokuthi ‘lipilisi’, isikhandelambeleko esimjovo namakhondomu wabantu bembaji newebengubo.
zul: zibandakanya izinto zokuvikela ukukhulelwa eziphuzwa ngowesifazane, ezaziwa ‘njengephilisi eliyisivikela kukhulelwa’; umjovo wokuvikela ukukhulelwa; kanye namakhondomu abesilisa nabesifazane.

nbl: khuyini engingakwenza nasele ngisidisi?
zul: yini engingayenza uma ngikhulelwe?

nbl: nawusola bonyana usidisi, khamba nomuntu omthembako emtholapilo oseduze uyokuhlolelwa ukuba sidisi.
zul: uma kwenzeka ucabanga ukuthi ukhulelwe, hamba nomuntu omethembayo niye emtholampilo oseduzane uyohlolelwa ukukhulelwa.

nbl: itjhejo lomuntu osidisi (ukutlhogonyelwa komntwana ongakabukubelethwa) kuqakathekile begodu kuthoma ngeveke yobunane.
zul: unakekelo lokhulelwe (lunakekela umntwana engakazalwa) kanti lubalulekile kakhulu futhi luqala uma lowo okhulelwe esenamaviki ayisishiyagalombili okukhulelwa.

nbl: umtholapilo wangekhenu ungakusiza ngetjhejo lomuntu osidisi begodu umsebenzi wezamaphilo uzokusiza ukutlama ihlelo elivumelana nawe nomntanakho.
zul: umtholampilo wangakini uzokusiza ngonakekelo lokhulelwe futhi umsebenzi wezempilo uzokusiza ukuthi uthuthukise uhlelo olulungele wena kanye nomntwana wakho.

nbl: nawusidisi, kuqakathekile ukugoma imivango enezakhamzimba, ukuthabulula umzimba, ukulala ngokwaneleko nokuzila iindakamizwa notjwala.
zul: uma ukhulelwe, kubalulekile ukuthi udle ukudla okunempilo kanye nomsoco, uzivocavoce, ulale ngokwanele kanye nokugwema izidakamizwa kanye notshwala.

nbl: *ilwazeli ulilethelwa mnyango wezamaphilo wakwazulu natala.
zul: *lolu lwazi niluhlinzekwa ngumnyango wezempilo kwazulunatal.

nbl: ukuba sidisi lokha nawusese litlawana kuzokuba nomthelela omumbi epilweni yakho yoke, nokho zikhona iindlela zokobana uvikele ukuba sidisi okungakahlelwa.
zul: ukukhulelwa usemncane kuzomosha impilo yakho yonke, kodwake zikhona izindlela zokuzigcina uphephile ekukhulelweni okungahlelelwe.
